rule.description: Ungangenisa esi silungiselelo ngokucofa-ekunene kwimenyu nakweliphi na iphepha lewebhu .

glob.title: Indlela yeglobhu isebenzisa i {{1}} ilayibrari Nceda ubone ukuze uyisebenzise, ​​okanye unokukhangela ukusetyenziswa kwe{2}}

example.a: {{1}}, ehambelana nephepha lasekhaya likaYouTube kunye nawo onke amaphetshana.
